doctor.name: Dr. Md. Maruful Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Maruful Islam is a Plastic Surgeon in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Plastic Surgery), FACS (USA). He is a Associate Professor, Plastic Surgery at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Maruful Islam at Labaid Diagnostic, Rangpur is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. M.A. Hamid Palash
doctor.info: Dr. M.A. Hamid Palash is a Plastic Surgeon in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Plastic Surgery). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Good Health Hospital, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. M.A. Hamid Palash at Good Health Hospital, Rangpur is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.

chamber.visitingTime: Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour
